example.eg: He studied hard and got good grades this year.
example.egtrans: 今年他学习很努力，取得了良好的成绩。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出色的, 质量高的, 美味的

example.eg: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 天气预报说明天天气良好。

example.eg: Now you be good while I'm gone, do you hear?
example.egtrans: 我出去了，你要听话，听到了吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 听话的, 乖巧的, 守规矩的

example.eg: You can earn a good living as a mechanic.
example.egtrans: 当一名机械师，你可以过上富裕的生活。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 足够的, 充裕的, 富裕的

example.eg: Cod liver oil is supposed to be good for you.
example.egtrans: 鱼肝油对你的健康有益。

example.eg: Whoever said that pain is good for the soul?
example.egtrans: 是谁说痛苦对于灵魂有益的？

example.eg: Political decisions should always be for the good of the people.
example.egtrans: 政治决议总是应当符合人民群众的利益。

example.eg: He's a good man.
example.egtrans: 他是个好人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 善良的, 好的, 有品德的

example.eg: Shoe boxes are good for storing old postcards and letters.
example.egtrans: 鞋盒适合用来装过去的明信片和信件。

example.eg: She's a very good accountant.
example.egtrans: 她是一位能力强的会计。

example.eg: Good answer!
example.egtrans: 答案正确！

example.eg: You've ruined our family's good reputation.
example.egtrans: 你毁了我们家族受人尊敬的声誉。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 值得尊敬的，受人尊敬的

example.eg: He's got good taste in wine.
example.egtrans: 他对于葡萄酒有极佳的品味。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 品味好的, 高品位的

example.eg: The company promised to deliver the goods within 24 hours.
example.egtrans: 该公司承诺在24小时内发货。

example.eg: He is good at anything related to numbers.
example.egtrans: 他擅长一切与数字有关的事。

example.eg: My sister is good with numbers but I'm better at languages.
example.egtrans: 我姐姐擅长数字方面的事，而我更擅长语言。

example.eg: He is good with children and animals.
example.egtrans: 他善于与小孩和动物打交道。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 善于应付, 善于与…打交道

example.eg: Your international driving licence is good for one year; you can renew it after that.
example.egtrans: 你的国际驾驶执照在一年内有效，你可以在其过期后续期。

example.eg: Your admission ticket is also good for one drink at the bar when you get inside.
example.egtrans: 进去后，你的入场券还能在吧台换到一杯饮料。

example.eg: That tatty old sofa is good for the dump.
example.egtrans: 那张破破烂烂的旧沙发很适合放在垃圾堆里。

example.eg: My daughter is good to me; she comes to visit every Sunday and brings cake.
example.egtrans: 我女儿对我很好，每周日都来看我，还带蛋糕来。

example.eg: Is lasagne a good thing to serve to your parents?
example.egtrans: 用千层面招待您父母合适吗？

example.eg: You'll have to speak into my good ear if you want me to hear.
example.egtrans: 如果你想让我听见的话，就得对着我好的那只耳朵说话。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 还能发挥功用的, 好的

example.eg: Is that milk still good?
example.egtrans: 牛奶仍然新鲜吗？

example.eg: This is a really good apple.
example.egtrans: 这个苹果味道真不错。

example.eg: I can't tell if this certificate is good or not.
example.egtrans: 我不知道该证书是真的还是假的？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 真的，真实的，名副其实的

example.eg: Those stocks were a good investment.
example.egtrans: 那些股票是很好的投资。

example.eg: This house needs a good cleaning.
example.egtrans: 这栋房子需要好好打扫一下。

example.eg: There's lots of good soil in this part of the country.
example.egtrans: 这个国家这一地区的土壤很肥沃。

example.eg: He's a good Catholic.
example.egtrans: 他是个虔诚的天主教徒。

example.eg: He's a good union man.
example.egtrans: 他是个忠诚的工会成员。

example.eg: She has good skin.
You should wear your good suit for this dinner.
example.egtrans: 你应该穿你那套好西服出席这次晚宴。

example.eg: His first serve was good.
example.egtrans: 他的一发很出色。

example.eg: This car runs good.
"Good," said the teacher when the student handed in his homework on time.
example.egtrans: 当这名学生按时上交作业时，老师评价道：“很好。”

example.eg: I did it for the good of all of us.
example.egtrans: 我这样做是为了我们大家的利益。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 福利, 利益, 好处

example.eg: There's a lot of good in his idea.
example.egtrans: 他的想法中有不少可取之处。

example.eg: You should always seek out the good in people.
example.egtrans: 你应该始终去发掘他人身上的闪光点。

example.eg: What good is it to ask all these questions without answering them?
example.egtrans: 提出所有这些问题却得不到答案，这有什么用呢？

example.eg: The police are hoping that their informer will come up with the goods.
example.egtrans: 警方希望他们的线人能提供情报。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 消息, 情报, 新闻

dsense.name: a great deal, a good deal

example.eg: I chose the car because it was reliable and a great deal.
example.egtrans: 我选择这辆车是因为可靠且性价比高。

dsense.name: a great deal, a good deal

example.eg: I have a great deal to accomplish before the end of the semester.
example.egtrans: 这个学期结束前我还有很多事情要完成。

dsense.name: a great deal of [sth], a good deal of [sth]

example.eg: Her presidential campaign had a great deal of success at the local level.
example.egtrans: 她的总统竞选在地方一级取得巨大成功。

dsense.name: a great deal, a good deal

example.eg: I value your input a great deal.
example.egtrans: 我非常重视您的意见。

dsense.name: a great deal, a good deal

example.eg: I'm feeling a great deal better since I ate some soup.
example.egtrans: 喝了一些汤后，我感觉好多了。

dsense.name: a great deal of effort, a good deal of effort

example.eg: I put a great deal of effort into this project, and I was really offended when management ignored it.
The doctor assured the family that the patient would be out of hospital the next day, all in good time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 耐心点, 别着急, 要有耐心

example.eg: I don't think his later films are any good.
Was the ointment I gave you any good?
He is as good at maths as my brother.
I've worked all night on the picture and it's as good as finished.
The smaller football teams have no chance of finishing top of the league, so winning one of the cup competitions instead is as good as it gets.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最多能做到，最好的情况是

example.eg: John fixed my bike and now it's as good as new!
I was able to buy my PC at a good price.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好价钱, 以不错的价格

dsense.name: be in a good place, be in a happy place
bid [sb/sth] good riddance, bid good riddance to [sb/sth]

trans_examp.trans_cn: 摆脱...是对的, 让...走太好了

dsense.name: by a great deal, by a good deal

example.eg: The Indian Ocean is smaller than the Pacific Ocean by a great deal.
Being honest with each other is for the common good.
When someone joins the Boy Scouts, one of the requirements is to do a good deed every day.

dsense.name: do [sb] a good turn, do a good turn for [sb]

trans_examp.trans_cn: 帮助某人, 做对某人有利的事

example.eg: If I were a millionaire, I would use my wealth to do good.
You can do good if you just try.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 身体健康, 体魄强健

example.eg: I didn't get top marks in the exam, but my results were fairly good.
I feel good now that my exams are over.  Springtime always makes me feel good.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 感到高兴, 觉得舒坦, 感到愉悦
感觉良好, 不觉得内疚
为了慈善事业, 做善事

example.eg: His severe injury ended his sports career for good.
example.egtrans: 严重的伤病永久地结束了他的体育生涯。

example.eg: Emily added an extra teaspoon of cinnamon to the recipe for good measure.

dsense.name: get off to a good start

example.eg: Our new employee has gotten off to a good start.

dsense.name: give [sb] a good telling-off, give [sb] a good telling off

example.eg: When the boss found out what had happened, Sally was taken into the office and given a good telling-off.
Phil wished me good afternoon as he passed me in the corridor.
example.egtrans: 当菲尔在走道碰到我时，他问我下午好。

example.eg: Billy got a sticker for his good behavior today at school.
I expect that he will have his prison term reduced for good behaviour.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 表现好, 好孩子，乖孩子

example.eg: Good boy!  You received an "A" in mathematics.
I got a good buy on these drinks, only $1 per bottle.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好买卖, 有利的交易
明智的决策, 聪明的决定, 高几率

example.eg: The party guests were in good cheer.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 寻欢作乐, 美酒佳肴, 美酒佳肴

example.eg: My mother says I was a good child when I was younger.
A good Christian uses Jesus as an example for his life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 虔诚的基督教徒, 好基督教徒

example.eg: I would not wear my good clothes while doing the housework.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好伙伴, 志趣相投的伙伴

example.eg: William had a good day at the races, winning a considerable amount of money.
example.egtrans: 威廉姆在比赛中度过了愉快的一天，还赢了一大笔钱。

example.eg: Have you done any good deeds lately, like donating blood?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好事, 善事, 高尚的行为

example.eg: Labradors have a good disposition which makes them a good dog around children.

dsense.name: good dog
dsense.guideword: (used to praise a canine) (赞美狗的用语)

example.eg: Good English is a necessity for any foreign student wishing to study at an English university.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好的英语能力, 英文流畅

example.eg: It isn't the best computer available, but it's good enough for my needs.
"Good evening, Sir. Are you ready to order?" asked the waiter.
example.egtrans: “先生，晚上好。请问您准备好点餐了？”服务员问道。

example.eg: As a teacher, it is important to set a good example for your students.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 很好的运动，很好的锻炼方式

example.eg: I have a good feeling about this interview.
I've got a good feeling about you. I think you'll go far in this company.
My daughter´s new boyfriend seems a good fellow.
Athletes eat only good food.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 健康食品, 优质食品

example.eg: Laurel and Hardy films are good for a laugh.
example.egtrans: 劳雷尔和哈迪的电影很好笑。

example.eg: I might see if Karen's free to come out; she's always good for a laugh.
example.egtrans: 我去看看凯伦是否有空出来。她总是很幽默。

example.eg: You have lost 10 pounds already? Good for you!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 做得不错, 干得漂亮

example.eg: Eating plenty of fruits and vegetables is good for you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有益你的健康的, 对你的（身体）有好处的

example.eg: The horse is in good form for the race.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 健壮的体魄, 良好的健康状况

example.eg: It is good form to offer your seat to a lady.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 举止有礼, 有礼貌的行为

example.eg: He had good fortune to win the lottery.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好运气, 好机遇, 好友, 好朋友

example.eg: It was always good fun going sailing with my cousin's family.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有趣的事, 好玩的事, 有趣的玩笑, 高分, 好分数

example.eg: "Good grief! Ben's finally managed to pass his driving test!"
"Good grief! We must have been here for at least half an hour and still haven't been served."
I'm glad she's going out with Rob: he's a good guy.
Almost every major movie involves the good guys versus the bad guys.
I am lucky to enjoy good health.
My grandmother does not have good hearing so you need to speak clearly to her.
When the sun is shining, it puts me in good humour.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 善良, 好心情, 愉快的情绪

example.eg: It is a good idea to brush your long hair before going to sleep.
Sliced bread was a good idea.
example.egtrans: 幸好你带伞了！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好的创意, 好榜样, 好影响, 幸运的是，幸好
